afkpeace.config.title: AFKPeace Config
afkpeace.option.autoAfk.tooltip: Turns on all features of AFKPeace when the player is left AFK
afkpeace.option.damageLogoutEnabled.tool: Disconnect the client when damage is taken
Allow the reconnection feature to work when disconnection happens due to the damage logout feature
afkpeace.option.featuresEnabledIndicator: Places a small text box in the upper left corner when any AFKPeace features are enabled
afkpeace.option.autoAfkTimer.tooltip: Amount of time in seconds before Auto AFK turns on
afkpeace.option.secondsBetweenReconnectA: Number of seconds between attempts to reconnect to the server
afkpeace.option.reconnectAttemptNumber.t: Amount of attempts before the client gives up attempting to reconnect
afkpeace.option.damageLogoutTolerance.to: Amount of damage (in hitpoints) allowed before the damage logout feature activates
